code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import rootReducer from'./reducers';import{loadState,saveState}from'./actions/stateActions';var initialState=loadState();var middleware=[thunk];var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware));store.subscribe(function(){saveState(store.getState());});export default store;
